---

# pingone_group_role_assignments (Data Source)

Data source to retrieve all role assignments for a given group.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "pingone_group_role_assignments" "all_role_assignments_by_group" {
  environment_id = var.environment_id

  groupid = pingone_group.my_awesome_group.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `environment_id` (String) The ID of the environment to read assignments from.  Must be a valid PingOne resource ID.  This field is immutable and will trigger a replace plan if changed.
- `group_id` (String) The ID of the group to read assignments from.  Must be a valid PingOne resource ID.  This field is immutable and will trigger a replace plan if changed.

### Read-Only

- `ids` (List of String) A list of group IDs assigned to the given `group_id`.
